reasoning: Soft tissue sarcomas globally: ~4 per 100k per year based on SEER and international registry data circa 2005. Includes all histological subtypes (liposarcoma, leiomyosarcoma, UPS, etc.).
source: Toro JR et al. (2006). Incidence patterns of soft tissue sarcomas in the SEER program, 1978-2001. Int J Cancer. 119(12):2922-30
